creditline: Gift of Fay M. Gallus and Richard M. Sweet
markings: verso, TC in brown ink: THE YOSEMITE VALLEY, FROM THE MARIPOSA TRAIL \ verso, C in brown ink: You are most cordially invited, together with your friends to visit / YOSEMITE GALLERY, / Entrance, Bradley & Rulofson's celebrated Photographic Establishment, No. 429 Montgomery Street, San Francisco. / Our collection of Landscape Views, large, Stereoscopic and intermediate sizes, embracing Yosemite Valley, Mammoth Trees, Heysers, Mount Shasta, / Oregon, Columbia River, Pacific Railroad, Coast, Mining, City, ect., ect., will / we feel assured, give you pleasure to examine as it will us to extend you every courtesy in our power. / Respectfully, / C. E. WATKINS, Landscape Photographer, / STEREOSCOPIC VIEWS $1.50 PER DOZEN.
medium: Albumen print mounted on announcement card
title: The Yosemite Valley from the Mariposa Trail
